name: NSWorkspace.DesktopImageOptionKey
desc: Keys that indicate how to display a new desktop image.

items.name: static let imageScaling: NSWorkspace.DesktopImageOptionKey
items.desc: A key that contains the behavior to use when scaling the image.

items.name: static let allowClipping: NSWorkspace.DesktopImageOptionKey
items.desc: A key that contains the behavior to use when clipping the image.

items.name: static let fillColor: NSWorkspace.DesktopImageOptionKey
items.desc: A key that contains the behavior to use when filling the empty space around the image.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Initializes an option key using the specified raw value.
